biotools.summary: Amica is an interactive and user-friendly web-based platform that accepts proteomic input files from different sources and provides automatically generated quality control, set comparisons, differential expression, biological network and over-representation analysis on the basis of minimal user input.

bioschemas.name: amica
bioschemas.summary: Amica is an interactive and user-friendly web-based platform that accepts proteomic input files from different sources and provides automatically generated quality control, set comparisons, differential expression, biological network and over-representation analysis on the basis of minimal user input.
